question_list.question: What societal issues need more support?
question_list.description:
Please express your opinion using Quadratic Voting as described above. You have a total of 36 credits for the following 9 issues. You do not need to use up all the credits, but you cannot exceed 36 credits.

If you think that an issue needs more support, you can cast upvotes for that issue. Vice versa, you can cast downvotes for issues that you think require less support.

options.description: (Animal Rights, Welfare, and Services; Wildlife Conservation; Zoos and Aquariums)
